original_title: Un narciso observándose en el espejo de un baño público
overview: 46-year-old Agustin has lived with a dissociative identity disorder resulting from the rape of his own father when he was just 10 years old, this disorder has caused physical and psychological damage to Agustin, now he  must survive himself.
title: Un narciso observándose en el espejo de un baño público
